thread.title: BRIEF-Easterly Acquisition Extends Time To Complete Business Combination With JH Capital To June 30

title: BRIEF-Easterly Acquisition Extends Time To Complete Business Combination With JH Capital To June 30
text:
March 29, 2018 / 4:18 PM / in 19 minutes BRIEF-Easterly Acquisition Extends Time To Complete Business Combination With JH Capital To June 30 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
March 29 (Reuters) - Easterly Acquisition Corp: 
* EASTERLY ACQUISITION CORP. ANNOUNCES EXTENSION OF TIME TO COMPLETE PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED BUSINESS COMBINATION WITH JH CAPITAL 
* EASTERLY ACQUISITION - STOCKHOLDERS VOTED TO EXTEND DEADLINE TO COMPLETE AN INITIAL BUSINESS COMBINATION WITH JH CAPITAL TO JUNE 30 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
